price: (3) And [to] others of them who have not yet joined them. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
arabic: وَءَاخَرِينَ مِنۡهُمۡ لَمَّا يَلۡحَقُواْ بِهِمۡۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: waākharīna min'hum lammā yalḥaqū bihim wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
